snippet: Greece's politicians made a last effort on Friday to resolve a political crisis or risk the likelihood of the country being forced out of the euro zone. But are the Greeks, and Europe's banks, ready for the return of the drachma?
abstract: Greece's politicians made a last effort on Friday to resolve a political crisis or risk the likelihood of the country being forced out of the euro zone. But are the Greeks, and Europe's banks, ready for the return of the drachma?
